summary: WeakMap and WeakSet were deleted from the SDK but need to be restored to support private variables in TypeScript. The issue also flags FinalizationRegistry for deletion.
userImpact: Users cannot use private variables in TypeScript workflows because required WeakMap and WeakSet functionality is missing from the SDK.
rootCause: WeakMap and WeakSet were removed from the SDK polyfills, preventing TypeScript's private field implementation from working correctly.
proposedFix: Restore WeakMap and WeakSet implementations; also remove FinalizationRegistry as suggested.
resolutionDetails: WeakMap and WeakSet were restored to support private variables in TypeScript; FinalizationRegistry was deleted.
keyQuote: need this to use private variables in typescript
